title: Vest
description: front and back constructed of two sections separated by cording; horizontal geometric embroidery (or woven), various size strips; underarm sections have vertical patterns; fully lined; pink, tan, with blue metallic thread; front ties; black banding and lining
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
